config.codeutilities.title: CodeUtilities Config
config.codeutilities.option.autoafk.tool:
Enable or disable the mod automatically marking you
as afk after a certain amount of time.
config.codeutilities.option.autoafk_time: The time till you are marked afk automatically (ticks)
config.codeutilities.option.autoafk_resp:
The response you will send if someone tries to message
you while you are afk.
config.codeutilities.option.autoafk_soun: The sound that gets played when you get marked as afk automatically.
config.codeutilities.option.sidechat_wid:
The width to be used by the second chat.
If set to 0, the width will be calculated from the\nlower of main chat width & window space remaining.
config.codeutilities.option.sidedchat_me: Filter that matches text that comes from the /msg command.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.screen_: Filter that matches text with a pattern defined by you.
Filter that matches text that comes from the /msg command.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.support: Filter that matches text that comes from Support Chat.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.mod_mod: Filter that matches text that comes from Mod Chat.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.admin_a: Filter that matches text that comes from Admin Chat.
Side for chat matching the Custom Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.custom_filte:
Messages containing these phrases are filtered
into the 'Custom' Chat Side.
Seperate phrases with commas.
config.codeutilities.option.messages.sid: Side for chat matching the /msg filter.
config.codeutilities.option.support_chat: Side for chat matching the Support Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.mod_chat.sid: Side for chat matching the Mod Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.admin_chat.s: Side for chat matching the Admin Chat filter.
Sound for chat matching the Custom Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.messages.sou: Sound for chat matching the /msg filter.
config.codeutilities.option.support_chat: Sound for chat matching the Support Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.mod_chat.sou: Sound for chat matching the Mod Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.admin_chat.s: Sound for chat matching the Admin Chat filter.
config.codeutilities.option.support_queu: Toggle where queue join/leave messages are displayed.
config.codeutilities.option.streamerDesc:
§9§l§nStreamer Mode

§7Below are options to help make the stream experience better.
§oExclusive to Jeremaster.
config.codeutilities.option.streamer.too:
Enable Streamer Mode.
Turning this option off will make
all other options no longer work.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.streame:
The individual configurable
parts of the Streamer Mode.
config.codeutilities.option.streamerAuto:
Automatically runs "/adminv off" silently
when you join a node.

Automatically runs "/chat local" silently
when you join a node or join a plot.
config.codeutilities.option.streamerSpie:
Hides spy (*) messages, including
session spy, muted spy, and DM spy.
config.codeutilities.option.streamerHide: Hides plot ads and blocks it's sound.
Hides the BuycraftX plugin update message.

Blocks all support messages and sounds, including:
- Support broadcast
- Support queue
- Support question
- Support answer

Blocks all moderation messages and sounds, including:
- Mod broadcast
- Incoming report
- Silent punishment
- Alt scanner
- AntiX alerts
- Teleport
- Join fails

Blocks all admin messages and sounds, including:
- Admin broadcast
config.codeutilities.subcategory.streame: Option to add your own regex to hide additional messages.
config.codeutilities.option.streamerHide: Enable this feature. Effective only if streamer mode is on.
Regex the message has to fully match.
Shows CPU Usage for a plot on the screen
if /lagslayer is enabled.
config.codeutilities.subcategory.automat:
Automatically runs /time upon
entering dev or build mode.
config.codeutilities.option.autoRC.toolt:
Automatically runs /rc upon
entering dev mode.
config.codeutilities.option.autonightvis:
Automatically enables Night Vision
upon entering dev or build mode.
config.codeutilities.option.autolagslaye:
Automatically display CPU usage upon
joining one of your plots.
config.codeutilities.option.autoClickEdi:
Automatically clisk messages like
the ones that appear when you
shift l-click a text
config.codeutilities.option.debug.toolti: Enables a debug mode for developers. Only if you know what you're doing.
config.codeutilities.option.loadTabStars: Shows other players that are using codeutilities.
config.codeutilities.option.relocateTabS: Shows tablist stars after users names instead of before.
config.codeutilities.option.dfButton.too: Adds a button in the title screen to join DiamondFire.
config.codeutilities.option.dfNodeButton: Adds node specific buttons in the title screen to join DiamondFire.
config.codeutilities.option.clickToReply: Makes /messages clickable so you can reply easily to players!
command.codeutilities.require_creative_m: You must be in creative mode to use this command!
command.codeutilities.require_dev_mode: You must be in dev mode to use this command!
